title: bug splat
body:
Am i going to get suspended for the game dropping.

The client dropped the match than said it founds problems with my installation.

replies.body: You shouldn't get any punishment like a suspension for just this one time! Let that repair finish, but do be sure to test it in a custom or practice match first to make sure everything is working alright!
It's fine now. I was just irritated because I know people were ready to play and it got afk'd or dropped w/e
